Description: Newly renovated with new carpeting, Shaker Kitchen cabinets, Granite countertops, new flooring, Private deck, 2 parking spots (1 Indoor). Common area laundry. Walking distance to Watertown Square and MBTA Bus routes to Boston, Cambridge, Newton, Waltham. Easy access to Rt. 16, 20 and Mass Pik Arsenal Yards, with cinema, Brewery, restaurants and shops as well as Local restaurants, banking and shops.
